  solution:
    css: |-
      :root {
        --red: #d33f49;
        --orange: #ff6300;
        --purple: #993d70;
        --green: #44bc96;
        --dark-blue: #466683;
        --blue: #4d8dc9;
        --shiny-logo: url('https://git.io/Je7D2');
      }

      /* ---- color ---- */
      .shiny {
        color: #4d8dc9;
      }

      /* ---- size ---- */
      .big-square {
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
        background: #44bc96;
      }

      .small-square {
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
        background: #4d8dc9;
      }

      /* ---- border ---- */
      .big-square {
        border: solid thick #d33f49;
      }

      .small-square {
        border: 2px solid #993d70;
      }

      /* ---- background ---- */
      .shiny-logo {
        width: 150px;
        height: 150px;
        background-color: #4d8dc9;
        background-image: url('https://git.io/Je7D2');
        background-size: contain;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
      }

      .shiny-logo2 {
        width: 150px;
        height: 150px;
        background: #4d8dc9 center / contain no-repeat url('https://git.io/Je7D2');
      }
output: js4shiny::html_document_plain
